ygData.subject: Re: Dimensional Pocket and Staff of Tracing
ygData.msgSnippet: Staff of tracing is only good if yr roaming with necros with skel pets or if you don t have a better staff. Its delay is about 40 with 7 dmg...plus its magical
ygData.messageBody:
Staff of tracing is only good if yr roaming with necros with skel pets or if
you don't have a better staff. Its delay is about 40 with 7 dmg...plus its
magical which is useful, BUT its 2handed. So I guess its useful if u wish to
practice with 2h blunt before you get a...say Runed Totem Staff. Er, that is
not to sound like I'm downplaying the staff, very little mana for a
half-decent weapon...

This is what you want wanted to happen to us,
David Asher Brown
Xymox
Karana
